sentence.Network_en: On the supply side, individuals are assumed to operate on the principle of utility maximization.
sentence.Network_cn: 从供给方面来看, 假定个人行为是遵循效用最大化原则.

sentence.Network_en: Does the enterprise to be able to pursue the profit maximization.
sentence.Network_cn: 搞企业的都会追求利润最大化.

sentence.Network_en: The enhancement enterprise strength, realizes the income maximization and so on.
sentence.Network_cn: 增强企业实力, 实现收益最大化等.

entry.tran: 使增加至最大限度;充分利用(或重视)
entry.def: If you maximize something, you make it as great in amount or importance as you can.

example.ex: In order  to maximize profit the firm would seek to maximize output...
example.tran: 为了获得最大利润，这家公司会把产量增至最大。

example.ex: They were looking for suitable ways of maximising their electoral support.
example.tran: 他们正在寻找合适的途径来最大限度地获得选民的支持。

entry.tran: 使(计算机屏幕上的窗口)最大化
entry.def: If you maximize a window on a computer screen, you make it as large as possible.

example.ex: Click on the square icon to maximize the window.
example.tran: 点击方框，把窗口最大化。

means.word_mean: 1. the mathematical process of finding the maximum value of a function
2. the act of raising to the highest possible point or condition or position
